subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: At the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., five of the top six players in the field, including Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray, failed to reach the quarterfinals.
snippet: At the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., five of the top six players in the field, including Rafael Nadal and Andy Murray, failed to reach the quarterfinals.
